topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5550559163687276a9f20a00#post_5550559163687276a9f20a00
I dunno, Devil fruits can be way more devastating if the users can come up with creative uses for the powers. (A trainer could fill the same role.)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555056f163687269f6e90000#post_555056f163687269f6e90000
Hmm...If a trainer can do it, then an evil organization like Team Rocket could do it too. They would not need pokemons anymore.

Besides, if a devil fruit user's great weakness is water, don't a water-type pokemon would defeat all of those supposedly powerful devil fruit pokemon?
topics.author: 5239db6da4c72d22d9000358

topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5550580563687238a5bd0200#post_5550580563687238a5bd0200
Either way would work.

Doing it with the pokemon can add more of an unpredictable factor to it.

Water 7 Spoilers ahead.

[spoiler]Kaku's devil fruit power is the ability to turn into a fucking giraffe. But when he used his six powers training in conjunction with the giraffe form, He managed to give Pirate hunter Roronoa zoro a rough time.[/spoiler]

Edit: Devil fruit users become weak when they're submerged in water at knee level. (Being sprayed with water won't do anything.)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555058b0636872765a461000#post_555058b0636872765a461000
And when a pokemon uses Surf?
So basically you are making any pokemon weak to the water. Even pokemon who are resistant, like plant-type. So ff your pokemon who is resistance to water eats a devil fruit, it will be weak to water now?
topics.author: 5239db6da4c72d22d9000358

topics.body: If they're submerged knee deep in water. Yes. They'll become weak. (Their devil fruit powers get nullified and they start to become more sluggish. (And they start to drown if the water's deep enough.)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
Also.

1: You'd only need at least a couple of them. And Six is a full team. (So it's perfectly reasonable to counter water types.)

2: It's not like devil fruits are that abundant anyway.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
Just thought of something from OnePunch Man.

B-Ville was completely destroyed by Saitama when he punched the Steroid Brother out of commission onto the city. This just made me wonder...

Who got the credit of defeating that guy? Saitama obviously didn't since he wasn't registered yet. That means, some other hero that was there took the credit. I'm gonna go with King since he's always at places and people see him as the "strongest man on Earth".
